head.script: { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "Person", "name": "Basharat Ahmad Khan", "alternateName": ["Khan Basharat", "khanbasharat3a1"], "jobTitle": "Electronics & Communication Engineer", "description": "Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in AI/ML, SEO Expert, Blogger, and Tech Entrepreneur", "url": "https://www.khanbasharat.com", "sameAs": [ "https://github.com/khanbasharat3a1", "https://linkedin.com/in/khan-basharat", "https://twitter.com/khanbasharat3a1" ], "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "addressLocality": "Tangmarg", "addressRegion": "Jammu & Kashmir", "addressCountry": "India" }, "email": "khanbasharat3a1@gmail.com", "telephone": "+91-8899977743", "birthDate": "2004", "knowsAbout": [ "Artificial Intelligence", "Machine Learning", "IoT", "Embedded Systems", "SEO", "Blogging", "Python Programming", "Web Development" ], "alumniOf": "Model Institute of Engineering and Technology", "worksFor": { "@type": "Organization", "name": "Tech Insider Plus", "url": "https://techinsiderplus.com" } }

div.p: Passionate Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in AI/ML, IoT, and Embedded Systems. Co-founder of Tech Insider Plus with expertise in SEO, blogging, and innovative tech solutions.
Bridging the gap between technology and real-world applications

I am a passionate Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, IoT, and Embedded Systems. With hands-on experience in hardware design, software development, and data science, I strive to bridge the gap between technology and real-world applications.

I've worked on projects ranging from IoT-based automation and robotics to AI-powered healthcare solutions. As a co-founder of Tech Insider Plus, I actively explore emerging technologies and have built a tech blog reaching millions of users with 500K+ monthly impressions.

My skills span Python, C, MATLAB, Embedded C, Flask, VHDL, SQL, and web development. Currently, I'm focused on developing innovative solutions that enhance efficiency and accessibility. Let's connect and create the future together!
My journey through various roles and organizations
Worked on PLC programming and automation systems for pharmaceutical manufacturing processes.
Built tech blog reaching millions of users, achieved 500K+ monthly impressions, and grew business valuation to $10K.
Developed predictive models using Python and R, created data visualizations and technical reports.
Worked on AI and machine learning projects, gaining hands-on experience with various AI technologies and frameworks.
My academic journey and qualifications

div.div: Model Institute of Engineering and Technology
div.p: Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering

div.div: Govt Higher Sec. School Chandilora, Tangmarg
div.p: Completed higher secondary education with focus on science and mathematics.
Innovative solutions bridging technology and real-world applications
Developed an intelligent healthcare monitoring system using machine learning algorithms for early disease detection and patient monitoring.
Created a comprehensive IoT automation system for smart home applications with real-time monitoring and control capabilities.
Built and scaled a technology blog from scratch, achieving 500K+ monthly impressions and establishing a strong online presence in the tech community.
